DOC.detailed_description: 12 post-stroke subject recruit neurological rehabilitation department Loewenstein rehabilitation hospital , Raanana , Israel . The patient randomly assign one two group : 1 ) Experimental group . 2 ) Control group . The 2 week intervention ( 10 session ) group include vibration stimulus ( frequency 1 Hz amplitude 20 mm ) 20 minute structured standard physiotherapy 45 minute . The vibration stimuli experimental group do contralesional neck muscle , whereas vibration stimulus control group do contralesional hand . Different assessment do intervention , first day intervention , two week intervention one month post-intervention . The test include : Clinical Scale Contraversive Pushing , Lateropulsion Scale , Subjective Straight Ahead , Postural Assesment Scale Stroke Patients , Anterior Lateral Functional Reach Test , Posturography , Behavioral Inattention Test , Mesulam Cancellation Test , Line Bisection Test , Dynamic Starry Night sensation . Differences group calculate use t-tests Mann-Whitney , depend distribution normality correction multiple comparison . Smallest Real Difference ( SRD ) calculate detect minimal detectable change .
